#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <sstream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iterator>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#define eps 1e-5

int main() {
    using namespace std;
    //freopen("/Users/prakul/Dropbox/codes/codeJam/B-large-practice.in","rt",stdin);
//    freopen("/Users/prakul/Dropbox/codes/codeJam/B-large.out","wt",stdout);

    int n,m;
    string w;
    cin>>n;
    m=n;
    while(n--)
    {
        cout<<"Case "<<m-n<<":\n";
        int a,b,y;
        cin>>a>>b;
         int arr[a];
        double x;
        for(int i=0;i<a;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            arr[i] = (int)(x*100.0+eps);
        }
        sort(arr,arr+a,greater<int>());
        for(int ii=0;ii<b;ii++)
        {
            cout<<"Scenario "<<ii+1<<":\n";
            cin>>x;
            y =(int)(x*100.0+eps);
            for(int i=0;i<a;i++)
            {
                if(y>=arr[i])
                {
                    if(arr[i]%100)printf("%.2lf %d\n",(double)(arr[i]/100.0),y/arr[i]);
                else printf("%d %d\n",(arr[i]/100),y/arr[i]);
                    //cout<<<<" "<<y/arr[i]<<endl;
                    y-=(y/arr[i])*arr[i];
                    //y%=arr[i];
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
